channel.title: VPS Issue (windows 2008, status: offline)
channel.description:
I am using dewlance VPS' and for some reason it shut off without warning and has said "offline" on the control panel for over an hour or so now. Has any experienced an issue like this? when I hit the "boot" or "reboot" button it doesn't do anything even though it states it is in the process of doing so. I have used there services before and even with a lower-end vps and never had to come across this issue.
I also have contacted them with no reply.

item.title: VPS Issue (windows 2008, status: offline)
item.dc:creator: @kunn kunn
item.description:
@kunn wrote:

Dewlance already resolve each and every issues.

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I’d recommend asking the VPS Hosting Provider, possibly even submitting a support ticket, they’ll be able to assist you best.

Read full topic
